attributes.action: Remove John Bercow as speaker of the house for his impartiality to brexit debate
attributes.background: John Bercow has shown on numerous occassions during the brexit debate a tendency to favor remain supporters and also favored the labour party members viewpoints on several other debates when as the speaker of the house his viewpoint should be impartial.

rejection.details: The resignation of an MP, including the Speaker, would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
